Product Catalog

 
  • 52/90/100mm Traffic Signals
  • 200mm Traffic Signals
  • 300mm Traffic Signals
  • 400mm Traffic Signals
  • Traffic Countdown Meters
  • Warning Signals
  • Road Studs Series
  • Toll Station Traffic Signals
  • Traffic Controller Series

We provide a wide range of LED traffic products, which includes traffic lights, pedestrian lights, warning lights, digital countdown timers, and other ITS products such as solar road studs, traffic signal controllers, and wireless vehicle detection system.

Advanced automatic equipment, scientific management system, strict standard production procedures, mature quality management and testing system, will fully ensure our products' quality.

Sinowatcher Technology quality management system is in compliance with GB/T19001-2008 and ISO9001:2008 standard. Our products are CE, RoHs and IP65 certified, comply with EN12368:2006 traffic control equipment regulation and come with 3 years warranty.

We also provide customized development based on your specific market requirements.

 

 

 

 

 

MINI TRAFFIC SIGNALS

52mm and 100mm signals used at junctions or parking lots.

 

 

 

 

 

 

200mm TRAFFIC SIGNALS

Traffic and pedestrian modules or complete sets with up to 5 units for various traffic applications.

 

 

 

 

 

300mm TRAFFIC SIGNALS

Traffic and pedestrian modules or complete sets with up to 5 units for various traffic applications.

 

 

 

 

 

400mm TRAFFIC SIGNALS

Traffic and pedestrian modules or complete sets with up to 5 units for various traffic applications.

 

 

 

 

 

TRAFFIC COUNTDOWN SIGNALS

One, two or two and half digital units in different sizes.

 

 

 

 

 

 

WARNING SIGNALS

Various sized flashing units designed to enhance road safety, available in both AC and DC versions.

 

 

 

 

 

 

SOLAR ROAD STUDS

Round and square shaped solar cell powered flashing road studs.

 

 

 

 

 

 

TOLL STATION & TUNNEL SIGNALS

Red cross and green arrow symbol signalling units in different sizes.

 

 

 

 

 

 

TRAFFIC SIGNAL CONTROLLERS

Fixed time, adaptive and communicative traffic signal controllers for variety of junction applications.
